note: The serialized value written to Kafka will be dependant upon the Converter the connector is configured to use.
description: This example will parse a String from the value of the message, transforming it to a FIX structure. The input and output below are a JSON representation of a ConnectRecord. The value of the input record contains a FIX encoded message. The value of the output record contains a parsed representation of the FIX message as a Connect Struct.
name: Simple
